apiKey.label: Zep Cloud API Key
apiKey.help: Zep Cloud API key. When set, uses Zep Cloud instead of self-hosted Graphiti.

serverUrl.label: Graphiti Server URL
serverUrl.help: URL of your self-hosted Graphiti REST API server. Used when apiKey is not set.

userId.label: Zep Cloud User ID
userId.help: Fixed Zep Cloud user ID. If not set, derived from group ID strategy.

groupIdStrategy.label: Group ID Strategy
groupIdStrategy.help: How to partition the knowledge graph: channel-sender (per user per channel), session (per conversation thread), or static (single shared graph)

staticGroupId.label: Static Group ID
staticGroupId.help: Group ID to use when strategy is 'static'

autoCapture.label: Auto-Capture
autoCapture.help: Automatically capture conversations into the knowledge graph after each agent turn

autoRecall.label: Auto-Recall
autoRecall.help: Automatically inject relevant facts from the knowledge graph before each agent turn

maxFacts.label: Max Facts
maxFacts.help: Maximum number of facts to inject during auto-recall
